list.en: How much is the bus fare?
Isn't the traffic heavy?
Where is the nearest bus stop?
list.cn: 最近的公共汽车站在哪里?

list.en: Where can I get a bus ticket?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以买到公共汽车票?

list.en: Which bus should I take to downtown?
list.cn: 我应该乘哪路公共汽车去市中心?

list.en: Is this seat taken?
What's the stop called?
Please let me off at the next stop.
At which stop are you going to get off?
How often does the bus come?
When will it get to the terminal station?
Where are you going by train?
Is there a train that leaves in the afternoon?
When is the next train for new York?
list.cn: 下一班去纽约的火车什么时候开?

list.en: Where can I catch an express for Tokyo?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以搭到去东京的快车?

list.en: Where is the ticket office?
I'd like a hard seat.
Which platform does it go from?
Does the train stop at all stations?
list.cn: 这列火车在所有车站都停吗?

list.en: Is this the train for London?
list.cn: 这是开往伦敦的火车吗?

list.en: Where do I wait for the train to London?
list.cn: 我在哪里等去伦敦的火车?

list.en: Where is your passport?
Where's the baggage claim?
When will the plane take off?
Could you tell me which button controls the chair?
list.cn: 你能告诉我哪个按钮控制这把椅子吗?

list.en: Would you show me how to turn on the radio?
list.cn: 你能告诉我怎么打开收音机吗?

list.en: Please fasten your seat belts.
We offer meals, drinks, newspapers and so on.
list.cn: 我们提供饭菜、饮料、报纸等。

list.en: We are approaching London international airport.
list.cn: 我们正在接近伦敦国际机场。

list.en: Please stay on your seats before the plane reached the safe stop.
list.cn: 在飞机到达安全停靠点前，请留在座位上。

list.en: Where is the washroom?
Taxi.
Queue here for a taxi.
Let me check the meter out.
It isn't free. It's occupied.
list.cn: 它不是免费的。这是占领。

list.en: Let me share with you in the taxi fare.
list.cn: 让我和你分担出租车费吧。

list.en: Could you please drive faster? I'm in a hurry.
list.cn: 你能开快点吗?我赶时间。

list.en: There are five of us we can cram into one taxi.
list.cn: 我们五个人可以挤进一辆出租车。

list.en: Please get on from this side.
Can you stop right over there for a moment?
Can I put it on the back seat?
list.cn: 我能把它放在后座上吗?

list.en: Where is my cabin?
How many ports do we call at on our voyage?
list.cn: 我们在航程中要停靠几个港口?

list.en: Which way is the wind now?
Let's go for a walk on the deck.
list.cn: 我们到甲板上去走走吧。

list.en: I need to take something from my motion sickness.
Take a boat and you'll be fascinated by the peaks along river.
list.cn: 乘船，你会被沿河的山峰所吸引。

list.en: Let's get on board.
I don't like to travel by ship because I'm afraid of being seasick.
list.cn: 我不喜欢坐船旅行，因为我怕晕船。

list.en: The ship is going very fast.
Which train should I take?
How much to ride the train?
Excuse me? Where's the subway station?
list.cn: 原谅我吗?地铁站在哪里?

list.en: Which subway line will get me to the right place?
list.cn: 哪条地铁线能把我送到正确的地方?

list.en: Let people off first before you get on.
You can take subway line four.
I lost my card. What should I do?
list.cn: 我的卡丢了。我该怎么办?

list.en: It's about half an hour to get there.
list.cn: 到那里大约需要半个小时。

list.en: Could you tell me how to go to the platform?
list.cn: 你能告诉我怎么去站台吗?

list.en: I just can't figure out the subway system at all.
list.cn: 我就是搞不懂地铁系统。

list.en: Do you hire out cars?
Can I rent a car here?
Here is my international driving license and passport.
list.cn: 这是我的国际驾照和护照。

list.en: Do you have any cars available?
I'd like to rent a car for traveling.
Is a deposit necessary?
May I see the car before I rent it?
list.cn: 租车前我可以先看看车吗?

list.en: Do you offer any discounts?
How much does insurance cost?
Do I have to return the car here?
How much is it?
How much is it for per day with a one week term?
I have rental car coverage on my insurance policy.
list.cn: 我的保险单上有租车险。

list.en: My car is running out of petrol.
There is a no passing Lane.
list.cn: 有一条禁止通行的车道。

list.en: I have to slow it down a little bit.
Is it easy to drive there?
Do you want me to drive?
Buckle your seat belt.
Let's go for a ride.
What's the speed limit here?
Watch where you're going.
Can I see your driving license?
list.cn: 我能看一下你的驾驶执照吗?

list.en: Do you see any parking space?
Do you have any change for the parking fee?
Do you think it would be all right if I parked here?
list.cn: 你觉得我把车停在这里可以吗?

list.en: I don't see any space on this level.
list.cn: 我没看到这层有任何空间。

list.en: I can't find a parking spot.
I have a monthly pass to park here.
list.cn: 我有月票可以在这里停车。

list.en: How much is it to park here for an hour?
list.cn: 在这里停一小时要多少钱?

list.en: I'm just going to park here for a few minutes.
Do you think it would be all right if I parked here?
list.cn: 你觉得我把车停在这里可以吗?

list.en: You can't park here.
This is a tow away zone.
This is not a parking spot.
Would you like me to give you a ride?
Can you give me a lift after work?
list.cn: 下班后你能让我搭车吗?

list.en: Can I hitch a ride?
Do you need a ride home?
Could you give me a lift to supermarket?
list.cn: 你能让我搭车去超市吗?

list.en: I want to know if I can ride in your car to go back today.
list.cn: 我想知道我今天能不能坐你的车回去。

list.en: I took a ride to work yesterday.
Aunt Leo gives me a lift to the library.
list.cn: 利奥阿姨让我搭便车去图书馆。

list.en: I hitchhike all the way.
I hitchhiked from Tianjin to Beijing.
list.cn: 我从天津搭便车到北京。

list.en: I only want to hitch a ride home.
Without much money, I decided to thumb a ride to new York.
list.cn: 没有多少钱，我决定搭便车去纽约。

list.en: Can you give me a ride?
Hope is not out of your way.
Which form of transport do you prefer to use?
I think we should discourage people from using their private cars.
list.cn: 我认为我们应该劝阻人们不要使用私家车。

list.en: I generally ride my bike to school.
list.cn: 我通常骑自行车去上学。

list.en: I always go to work on foot.
Cycling is good for our environment.
list.cn: 骑自行车对我们的环境有益。

list.en: If you go to work by bicycle instead of by car, you may get more exercise.
list.cn: 如果你骑自行车而不是开车去上班，你可能会得到更多的锻炼。

list.en: You should ride along the bicycle line.
list.cn: 你应该沿着自行车线骑。

list.en: We always walk to school together.
list.cn: 我们总是一起走路上学。

list.en: I usually go to work by bicycle.
list.cn: 我通常骑自行车去上班。

list.en: I would rather go to work by bike than by bus.
list.cn: 我宁愿骑自行车上班，也不愿乘公共汽车。

list.en: What's the problem, officer?
What did I do wrong?
Can I see your license?
You were exceeding the speed limit.
Where do I go to pay the fine?
May I pay the fine by my credit card?
list.cn: 我可以用信用卡支付罚款吗?

list.en: I'm just going to give you a warning this time.
list.cn: 这次我只给你一个警告。

list.en: I got a parking ticket.
list.cn: 我收到一张违章停车罚单。

list.en: He got a ticket for speeding.
list.cn: 他因超速被开了一张罚单。

list.en: I got another traffic ticket.
list.cn: 我又收到一张交通罚单。
